Name: Grapefruit Daiquiri No.1
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The flavours of rum and grapefruit combine harmoniously - clean and fresh.
Nutrition: One serving of Grapefruit Daiquiri No.1 contains 170 calories
